meanings.definition: A device for measuring extremely low temperatures.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use cryometers to measure how cold it is in the Arctic.
meanings.sent2: The cryometers in the lab are essential for our research on freezing temperatures.
meanings.sent3: When the cryometers started beeping, everyone knew it was colder than a snowman's nose!
meanings.sent4: The cryometers stood still, capturing the icy whispers of winter in their readings.
meanings.sent5: The cryometers hummed softly, revealing the chill of the room with precision.

meanings.sent1: In the science museum, you can see many cryometers on display.
meanings.sent2: The researchers compared the readings from different cryometers to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The cryometers gathered together for a group photo, looking like a tiny army of thermometers.
meanings.sent4: As the experiment progressed, the cryometers whispered in unison, sharing their frozen secrets.
meanings.sent5: Each of the cryometers beeped happily, proud to be part of the temperature measurement team.
